mapper.select: select iwh_qty - owh_qty as stk_qty from ( select coalesce (sum(owh_qty),0) as owh_qty from matr_owh where wh_no = #{wh_no} and matr_no= #{matr_no} and used_yn = 'Y' and cust_no = #{custNo}) as owh_qty , ( select coalesce (sum(iwh_qty),0) as iwh_qty from matr_iwh where wh_no = #{wh_no} and matr_no= #{matr_no} and used_yn = 'Y' and cust_no = #{custNo}) as iwh_qty
mapper.update: update matr_stk set stk_qty = ( select iwh_qty - owh_qty from ( select coalesce (sum(owh_qty),0) as owh_qty from matr_owh where wh_no = #{wh_no} and matr_no= #{matr_no} and cust_no = #{custNo}) as owh_qty , ( select coalesce (sum(iwh_qty),0) as iwh_qty from matr_iwh where wh_no = #{wh_no} and matr_no= #{matr_no} and cust_no = #{custNo}) as iwh_qty ) , stat_trf_dt = now() where wh_no = #{wh_no} and matr_no = #{matr_no} and cust_no = #{custNo}

update prod_stk set stk_qty = ( select iwh_qty - owh_qty from ( select coalesce (sum(owh_qty),0) as owh_qty from prod_owh where wh_no = #{wh_no} and matr_no= #{prod_no} and cust_no = #{custNo}) as owh_qty , ( select coalesce (sum(iwh_qty),0) as iwh_qty from prod_iwh where wh_no = #{wh_no} and matr_no= #{prod_no} and cust_no = #{custNo}) as iwh_qty ) , stat_trf_dt = now() where wh_no = #{wh_no} and prod_no = #{prod_no} and cust_no = #{custNo}
mapper.select:
select a.stk_clos_no , to_char(a.clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as clos_dt
, a.matr_no as mp_no , b.matr_nm as mp_nm , coalesce (a.matr_iwh_qty,0) as iwh_qty --자재입고 , coalesce (a.matr_owh_qty,0) as owh_qty --자재출고 , coalesce (a.matr_stk_qty,0) as stk_qty --자재재고 , coalesce (d.matr_stk_qty,0) as jb_stk_qty --전일재고
, a.prod_no as mp_no , case when c.prod_nm = c.erp_prod_nm then c.prod_nm else concat (c.prod_nm,'(',c.erp_prod_nm,')') end as mp_nm , coalesce (a.prod_iwh_qty,0) as iwh_qty --재품입고 , coalesce (a.prod_owh_qty,0) as owh_qty --재품출고 , coalesce (a.prod_stk_qty,0) as stk_qty --재품재고 , coalesce (e.prod_stk_qty,0) as jb_stk_qty --전일재고
from stk_clos a left join matr_info b on a.matr_no = b.matr_no and b.cust_no = #{custNo} left join prod_info c on a.prod_no = c.prod_no and c.cust_no = #{custNo} left join ( select matr_no,to_char(clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as clos_dt ,coalesce (sum(matr_stk_qty),0) as matr_stk_qty from stk_clos where to_char(clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now() - '1 day' ::interval,'YYYY-MM-DD') and cust_no = #{custNo} group by matr_no,to_char(clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') ) d on a.matr_no = d.matr_no left join ( select prod_no,to_char(clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as clos_dt ,coalesce (sum(prod_stk_qty),0) as prod_stk_qty from stk_clos where to_char(clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(clos_dt - '1 day' ::interval,'YYYY-MM-DD') and cust_no = #{custNo} group by prod_no,to_char(clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') ) e on a.prod_no = e.prod_no where to_char(a.clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') between substring(#{dateFr},1,10) and substring(#{dateTo},1,10) and a.cust_no = #{custNo}
AND upper(replace(b.matr_nm,' ','')) like '%' || upper(replace(#{findSz}, ' ','')) || '%'
AND ( upper(replace(c.prod_nm,' ','')) like '%' || upper(replace(#{findSz}, ' ','')) || '%' or upper(replace(c.erp_prod_nm,' ','')) like '%' || upper(replace(#{findSz}, ' ','')) || '%' )
order by clos_dt,matr_nm collate "ko_KR.utf8", prod_nm collate "ko_KR.utf8" limit #{pageSz} offset #{pageNo}

select a.matr_no --자재번호 , a.matr_nm --자재명 , b.owh_no --자재출고번호 , f.ord_no --주문번호 , d.cmpy_no --주문고객번호 , g.cmpy_nm --주문고객명 , h.prod_nm --주문상품명 , b.owh_qty --입고수량 , to_char(d.ord_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as ord_dt --주문일자 , to_char(c.indc_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as indc_dt --작업지시일자 , to_char(b.owh_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as iwh_dt --자재출고일자 from matr_info a join matr_owh b on a.matr_no = b.matr_no and b.used_yn = 'Y' and to_char(b.owh_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{procDt} and b.cust_no = #{custNo} left join make_indc c on b.indc_no = c.indc_no and c.cust_no = #{custNo} and c.par_in dc_no = 0 left join ord_info d on c.ord_no = d.ord_no and d.cust_no = #{custNo} --and d.used_yn 'Y' left join ord_prod e on d.ord_no = e.ord_no and e.cust_no = #{custNo} --and e.used_yn = 'Y' left join make_indc f on d.ord_no = f.ord_no and f.par_indc_no = 0 and f.cust_no = #{custNo} --and f.used_yn = 'Y' left join cmpy_info g on d.cmpy_no = g.cmpy_no and g.cust_no = #{custNo} left join prod_info h on e.prod_no = h.prod_no and h.cust_no = #{custNo} where 1 = 1 and a.cust_no = #{custNo} AND a.matr_no = #{matrNo} AND e.prod_no = #{prodNo} order by iwh_dt desc , matr_nm collate "ko_KR.utf8" limit #{pageSz} offset #{pageNo}

join ( select wh_no, matr_no, sum(iwh_qty) as iwh_qty from matr_iwh where used_yn = 'Y' and cust_no = #{custNo} and to_char(iwh_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= substring(#{procDt},1,10) group by wh_no, matr_no ) d on a.wh_no = d.wh_no and a.matr_no = d.matr_no left join ( select wh_no, matr_no, sum(owh_qty) as owh_qty from matr_owh where used_yn = 'Y' and cust_no = #{custNo} and to_char(owh_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') max(k.chng_no) from matr_stk_hstr k where to_char(coalesce (k.mod_dt,k.reg_dt),'YYYY-MM-DD') = substring(#{procDt},1,10) and a.matr_no = k.matr_no and a.wh_no = k.wh_no and k.cust_no = #{custNo} ) and /*제품별 BOM기반 원부자재 재고 목록 (stockMapper.getMakePlanBomStkList) */ select a.par_bom_no as 모관리번호 , a.bom_no as 관리번호 , a.prod_no --제품관리번호 , c.prod_no --품번 , a.matr_no --원자재관번호 , a.bom_lvl --bom level , to_char(to_timestamp(c .plan_ut),'YYYY-MM-DD') as plan_dt , fn_get_prod_name(a.prod_no) as 제품명 , fn_get_matr_name(a.matr_no) as 원자재명 , a.consist_rt as 원료구성함량 , a.consist_qty as 단위자재소요량 , ( a.consist_rt * 0.01) * c.plan_qty --원료소요량 , a.need_qty * c.plan_qty --자재소요 , d.stk_qty --재고량 , fn_get_code_name('nm', b.matr_tp) as 원부자재구분 from prod_bom a join make_plan c on a.prod_no =c.prod_no and a.cust_no = c.cust_no and c.used_yn = 'Y' and to_char(to_timestamp(c .plan_ut),'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{planDt} join matr_info b on a.matr_no = b.matr_no and a.cust_no = b.cust_no and b.used_yn ='Y' left join matr_stk d on a.matr_no = d.matr_no where a.cust_no = #{custNo
